description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6peg2","text":"ARIAS is an AR-based advertising system, it can be manipulated by gestures interactively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
document: {"blocks":[{"key":"94le","text":"Introduction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgpul","text":"It is an interactive video playback system based on augmented reality and gesture recognition. The system recognizes the image captured by the camera in real time. When there is a predefined square marker, A cube is created at the marker position, and the pre configured video files are played on the six faces of the cube. The cube can be manipulated through gestures. It can be used for campus publicity, shopping mall guidance, scenic spot introduction, etc.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4p70","text":"   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2hqgi","text":"User guide","type":"header-two","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7i8lh","text":"Ensure the computer has at leat one webcamera.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7g48q","text":"Install Python and other external library(MeadiaPipe, OpenCV, OpenGL...).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61gcu","text":"Show one marker in front of the webcamera.The markers can be find in \"Markers\" folder. Now the feedback of the system will contain a virtual cube on the marker.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff8j7","text":"Show your hand and make gestures to manipulate the cube.There are six states when manipulating the cube. One gesture can indicate different instructions in different states.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7le0","text":"Gestures statementGesture states","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2c8q4","text":"Initialization: the program has just been initialized and no marker has been detected","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"culea","text":"Fronting state","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92j1o","text":"Translation state","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfe27","text":"Movement state","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef6v1","text":"Rotating state","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae4tr","text":"Zoom state","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edq7l","text":"State switching","type":"header-four","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9tgoj","text":"make gesture 00000 then 11111 to switch state. The five binary digit mean the state of five fingers, 0 mean closed and 1 mean expanded. The order is thumb, index finger, middle finger, ring finger and little thumb.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"797rq","text":"Fronting operation","type":"header-four","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eusb","text":"Front view 1: 01000","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"soe2","text":"Front view 2: 01100","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpk23","text":"Front view 3: 01110","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em6ta","text":"Front view 4: 01111","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gnsa","text":"Front view 5: 11111","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5547l","text":"Front view 6: 10001","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmce2","text":"Translation operation","type":"header-four","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ics3","text":"To left\t: 01000","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"831s0","text":"To right\t: 01100","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e55","text":"To up\t: 01110","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nf1","text":"To down\t: 01111","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l48m","text":"Rotation operation","type":"header-four","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7498o","text":"X +: 01000","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frha1","text":"Y +: 00100","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bicr2","text":"Z +: 00010 The three fingers can be combined arbitrarily, and when the thumb is expanded, the cube has a reverse rotation.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dtte","text":"Zoom operation","type":"header-four","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ip9j","text":"Zoom in: 01000","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ago1r","text":"Zoom out: 11000","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfqns","text":"Marker definition","type":"header-two","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lb7m","text":"5x5 white cells with black background. There are four corners of the marker and only one corner is an isolated cell, that is, the surrounding color is black. The last row and the last column have white cells, that is the sum of the values in the last row and the last column cannot be 0 (black 0, white 1)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ofpt","text":"The marker with isolated cell in the upper left corner is regarded as the standard marker. When the isolated cell is at the other three corners, the marker is considered to be the result of plane rotation on the basis of the standard marker.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4idrs","text":"  ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"au7qb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c00pc","text":"Software architecture","type":"header-two","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12r7s","text":"GeneralFunctions: Some common methods for the whole workspace.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g7d3","text":"GestureRecognizer: Recognize the gesture signal.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhhtd","text":"HandPointsProvider: Use MeadiaPipe as the frame for hand key point recognition to extract 2.5D coordinates of 21 key points of the hand.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epgra","text":"MarkerRecognizer: To recognize Markers.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63ri","text":"FaceBlanking: Optimization of box rendering, that is, not rendering the occluded faces.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98fgu","text":"ARIASMain: The main entity.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eifi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8prup","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"937B4230D9B511EDA2F7B9EBB1633EE5","height":189.00000000000023,"id":362651,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image1.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mce7b5qkf.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mce5b5qkf.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/mce6b5qkf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mce4b5qkf.webp","width":252.30582524271873}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"68D215E0D9B511EDA2F7B9EBB1633EE5","height":166.0890817538174,"id":362655,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mcfbb5qkf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mce9b5qkf.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/mcfab5qkf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mce8b5qkf.webp","width":339.5873418758346}}}}
